mapper.select: select SID, SENDTIME, OPER, ACTIONMONEY, PURCHASETIME, PAYTYPE, PURCHASETIMESTR, EXPECTTIME, CREATEOPER, GROUPID, MONEYNEEDPAY, MONEYNOTPAY, SHIPNUM, CONTENT, PCMONEY, CHECKOPER, EXPRESSMONEY, MONEYPAIED, CHECKTIME, CREATETIME, MANUFACTUREID, RETURNMONEY, OPERTIME, MANUFACTURE, FLAG, PAYTIME from DB_PURCHASEPAYMENT where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, SENDTIME, OPER, ACTIONMONEY, PURCHASETIME, PAYTYPE, PURCHASETIMESTR, EXPECTTIME, CREATEOPER, GROUPID, MONEYNEEDPAY, MONEYNOTPAY, SHIPNUM, CONTENT, PCMONEY, CHECKOPER, EXPRESSMONEY, MONEYPAIED, CHECKTIME, CREATETIME, MANUFACTUREID, RETURNMONEY, OPERTIME, MANUFACTURE, FLAG, PAYTIME from DB_PURCHASEPAYMENT
